headline: Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. (APD) Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: On May 22, Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. (NYSE:APD) declared a quarterly dividend of $1.79 per share, which was in line with its previous dividend. Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. (NYSE:APD) is an American multinational company that is known for its industrial gases, performance materials, and associated equipment and services. The company has maintained a […]
